class reform.parse.javacorpus.JavaCorpusStorage(publicAPIPath, visitor)¶

Bases: object

The storage holds all parsed Java snippets The storage also holds all parsed Java classes The key of the class storage is the class name - in the lower case. Which is used for operation, while the real name is used for the output

add(st)¶

Adds data to the storage

class reform.parse.javascriptcorpus.JavaScriptCorpusStorage(publicAPIPath, visitor)¶

Bases: object

The storage holds all parsed JavaScript snippets The storage also holds all parsed JavaScript classes The key of the class storage is the class name - in the lower case. Which is used for operation, while the real name is used for the output

Adds to the storage

class reform.parse.pythoncorpus.PythonCorpusStorage(publicAPIPath, visitor)¶

Bases: object

The storage holds all parsed Python snippets The storage also holds all parsed Python classes The key of the class storage is the class name - in the lower case. Which is used for operation, while the real name is used for the output

reform.parse.selector module¶

class reform.parse.selector.CorpusSelector¶

Bases: object

Selects corpus storage based on the language and options

PATH_MAP = {'JAVA_CLASSES': '/Users/yuriy/Documents/projects/up/reformulate/docs/data/APIClassesListJava8.txt', 'PYTHON_METHODS': '/Users/yuriy/Documents/projects/up/reformulate/docs/data/APIMethodsListPython27.txt', 'PYTHON_CLASSES': '/Users/yuriy/Documents/projects/up/reformulate/docs/data/APIClassesListPython27.txt', 'JAVASCRIPT_METHODS': '/Users/yuriy/Documents/projects/up/reformulate/docs/data/APIMethodsListJavaScript.txt', 'JAVA_METHODS': '/Users/yuriy/Documents/projects/up/reformulate/docs/data/APIMethodsListJava8.txt'}¶
static select(language, methods, **kwargs)¶

Select corpus storage :param language: requested language :param methods: if method reformulation (default: classes) :param kwargs: additional options (for testing) :return: corpus storage or NotImplemented
